items.title: Tata Power, Siemens among top bets by Chandan Taparia of MOFSL for today
items.description: Tata Power is trading near its all-time high price and given a range breakout on the weekly chart. The ADX indicator has turned up which supports the bullish trend.

items.title: Vinay Rajani of HDFC Securities suggests buying these stocks on Sept 25
items.description: Nifty has formed a spinning top like pattern on Sept 24 after remaining in a 125 points range. Nifty could now face resistance from 26,250 while 25,611-25,791 band could offer support.

items.title: Nifty Bank in overbought zone; Pvt Bank on the cusp of breakout; details
items.description: The Nifty Bank Index has entered the overbought zone according to technical indicators, signalling a potential near-term correction.

items.title: Market today: Dow, S&P500 at record high, Israel war, Manba IPO last day
items.description: Dow Jones and S&P 500 closed at record highs with a surge in mining stocks, buoyed by China's stimulus package

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets likely to take cues from Wall Street; GIFT Nifty muted
items.description: Stock Market Today: Indian equity markets were likely to open on a muted note, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures, however, the record closing highs overnight on the Wall Street could boost sentiment.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Infosys, Car Trade, SBI, Vadilal, NBCC, TVS Holdings
items.description: Stocks to Watch: The finance ministry may amend its circular to provide relief to Infosys regarding a Rs 30,000 crore GST demand.

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO GMP zooms 108% on opening day: should you subscribe?
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger's shares are commanding a premium of Rs 239, which translates to a GMP of 108 per cent, against the upper end of the IPO price of Rs 220

items.title: Buy calls are slowly vanishing from the booming stock market of India
items.description: The Nifty 200 index is valued at about 24 times its 12-month forward earnings estimates, versus last decade's mean of about 19 times

items.title: PC Jeweller hits 52-wk high as board to consider stock split on Sept 30
items.description: The uptick in PC Jeweller stock came after the company announced that the board will meet on September 30 to consider a stock-split.

items.title: Subhash Ghai's firm soars 18% in a day after pact with Zee; here's why
items.description: Shares of Mukta Arts skyrocketed 18.2 per cent at Rs 95.70 per share intraday on the BSE

items.title: Hariom Pipes up 4% after board okays fundraising of Rs 700 crore; details
items.description: The rise in Hariom Pipes share price came after the company announced that its board has approved fund raising of Rs 700 crore through issuance of equity shares or any other eligible securities.

items.title: Delta Corp to demerge hospitality, real estate biz; share price gains 8%
items.description: Delta Corp's board has approved the demerger of its hospitality and real estate business to Delta Penland Private Ltd (DPPL)
